contents.text: Thank you for calling Fin in San Francisco, where we help you reclaim your time and focus on what matters most.
For support with your Fin tools, press 1.
For assistance with setup and integration, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Fin specialist for setup and integration.

navigationGoals: Connect Fin to my Outlook calendar and Salesforce account.
I need help integrating Fin with my existing task and calendar system to streamline my post-service schedule.
I need to integrate Fin with my existing project management API and configure OAuth SSO.
I need help setting up my Fin account and connecting it to my email.
Help me integrate Fin with my Google Calendar to schedule my lab sessions.

contents.text: For troubleshooting and bug reports, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a Fin support engineer for troubleshooting and bug reporting.

navigationGoals: Resolve a syncing error that's preventing my project updates.
I’m getting sync errors in Fin and want to troubleshoot the issue so my tasks display correctly.
I’m experiencing a sync failure between Fin and my calendar app and need to report the bug.
My Fin app keeps freezing and I’d like someone to troubleshoot it.
Troubleshoot why Fin isn’t syncing my Dropbox folder for my research files.

contents.text: To learn about our productivity solutions, press 2.
For a walkthrough of key features, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our Fin product team for a feature overview.

navigationGoals: Give me a quick demo of Fin's automation and reporting features.
I’d like a guided walkthrough of Fin’s key features to see how they can support my daily planning.
Can you give me a deep dive on Fin’s advanced task automation features and API endpoints?
I’d like a simple walkthrough of Fin’s main features so I can use it.
Walk me through Fin’s key features for organizing my physics research tasks.

contents.text: To discuss enterprise pricing and plans, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our Fin sales team for pricing and plan details.

navigationGoals: Provide enterprise pricing options for a 50-employee team.
I need information on enterprise pricing and plans to see if Fin fits our veteran support organization’s needs.
I’d like to discuss enterprise-tier licensing, user seat pricing, and volume discounts for 500 users.
Can you explain your enterprise pricing plans and help me choose one?
Get enterprise pricing details for deploying Fin across our physics lab group.
